root.name: Valhalla Knights 3
root.description: OverviewValhalla Knights 3 is a fantasy action RPG developed by Marvelous AQL for the PlayStation Vita. It puts the player in the role of a newly arrived inmate at the prison castle Carceron, forced into searching for a legendary treausure by the wicked emperor. The game is focused on 7-on-7 party brawls, and features a fully customizable main character.Originally released in Japan in May 2013, it is due out in North America on October 15, 2013 from XSEED Games.StoryThe game takes place in a fantasy kingdom ruled by a tyrannical emperor. Obsessed with finding a certain legendary treasure, he has already conquered many a land in search of it. And most recently, he has come to believe it rests within the walls of Carceron, an old fortress now used as a massive prison. But finding the treasure won't be so easy as Carceron is a lawless place, with the guards largely letting the inmates run the place themselves, relying on the savage wildlands surrounding it to keep them contained.The player takes the role of a soldier on the losing side of one of the emperor's campaigns. Forced into the tyrant's service by a deadly curse, the character is sent to Carceron as an inmate and told to locate treasure if he/she wants to continue to live. Alone in this harsh place, the character must gather allies and work to gain the respect of the various faction who rule the place.
